程序包 webServiceAPI

接口 WebServicesTarget

所有已知实现类:
ServicesAdapter
public interface WebServicesTarget
Following the Default Adapter pattern, this class is a kind of default adapter class, the subclasses of the WebServices(son class) will implement the concrete stuff IWebServices is a kind of Adaptee All methods here will be empty method

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode[] getAllData​(java.lang.String path, java.lang.String query)
    like database basic function get all xx data(based on different parameter/path) return ObjectNode[] jsonNodes that contains data if the query is null - it will return all data
    com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode getSpecificData​(java.lang.String path, java.lang.String id, java.lang.String query)
    get the specific data according to specific id
    java.lang.String getToken​(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String password)
    Get Token from the server
    boolean patchData​(java.lang.String path, java.lang.String jsonString, java.lang.String id)
    patch the specific data according to specific id and specific data in the correct path
    com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode postData​(java.lang.String path, java.lang.String jsonString)
    like database basic function post the data to web service and update the database
    boolean putData​(java.lang.String path, java.lang.String jsonString, java.lang.String id)
    do same things with put or patch web request
    boolean verifyToken​(java.lang.String token)
    Verify the token

  • 方法详细资料

    • getToken

      java.lang.String getToken​(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String password) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.InterruptedException
      Get Token from the server
      参数:
      userName - user name
      password - password
      返回:
      token
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException
      java.lang.InterruptedException

    • verifyToken

      boolean verifyToken​(java.lang.String token) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.InterruptedException
      Verify the token
      参数:
      token - the token that you want to verify
      返回:
      boolean value: true-success, false-failure
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException
      java.lang.InterruptedException

    • getAllData

      com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode[] getAllData​(java.lang.String path, java.lang.String query) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.InterruptedException
      like database basic function get all xx data(based on different parameter/path) return ObjectNode[] jsonNodes that contains data if the query is null - it will return all data
      参数:
      path - the path of the operation to be performed (e.g. /users/login), see enums.Path or documentation for more details
      query - the query of the operation to be performed (e.g. ?id=1), see enums.Query or documentation for more details
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException
      java.lang.InterruptedException

    • postData

      com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode postData​(java.lang.String path, java.lang.String jsonString) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.InterruptedException
      like database basic function post the data to web service and update the database
      参数:
      path - URL path
      jsonString - a correct json string that can be parsed by Jackson and you want to add to the server
      返回:
      boolean value: true-success, false-failure
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException
      java.lang.InterruptedException

    • putData

      boolean putData​(java.lang.String path, java.lang.String jsonString, java.lang.String id) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.InterruptedException
      do same things with put or patch web request
      参数:
      path - sub URL path
      jsonString - schema of the data
      id - the id of the data
      返回:
      boolean value: true-success, false-failure
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException
      java.lang.InterruptedException

    • getSpecificData

      com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode getSpecificData​(java.lang.String path, java.lang.String id, java.lang.String query) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.InterruptedException
      get the specific data according to specific id
      参数:
      path - URL path
      id - the id of the data
      query - the query of the operation to be performed (e.g. ?id=1), see enums.Query or documentation for more details
      返回:
      objectNode contains the specific data
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException
      java.lang.InterruptedException

    • patchData

      boolean patchData​(java.lang.String path, java.lang.String jsonString, java.lang.String id) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.InterruptedException
      patch the specific data according to specific id and specific data in the correct path
      参数:
      path - URL path
      jsonString - schema of the specific data (e.g. "{\"isReceptionist\": true}")
      id - the id of the object/entity
      返回:
      boolean value: true-success, false-failure
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException
      java.lang.InterruptedException
